Name: Startup India Initiative
Description: Launched in 2016 to promote startups and innovation in India.

Name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY)
Description: Provides loans to micro and small enterprises without collateral.

Name: Stand-Up India Scheme
Description: Supports women and SC/ST entrepreneurs with bank loans.

Name: Atal Innovation Mission (AIM)
Description: Encourages innovation through tinkering labs and incubators.

Name: Credit Guarantee Fund Trust for Micro and Small Enterprises (CGTMSE)
Description: Helps small businesses get loans without collateral.

Name: Software Technology Parks of India (STPI)
Description: Supports IT startups with infrastructure and tax benefits.

Name: Multiplier Grants Scheme (MGS)
Description: Encourages industry-academia collaboration for tech innovation.

Name: Dairy Processing and Infrastructure Development Fund (DIDF)
Description: Funds dairy startups to improve milk processing infrastructure.

Name: National Skill Development Mission
Description: Provides vocational training and skill development for entrepreneurs.

Name: E-Biz Portal
Description: A one-stop platform for business registrations and approvals.

Name: Single Point Registration Scheme (SPRS)
Description: Enables small enterprises to participate in government tenders.

Name: National Manufacturing Competitiveness Programme (NMCP)
Description: Enhances MSME competitiveness through various initiatives.

Name: Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Scheme
Description: Promotes quality manufacturing with minimal environmental impact.

Name: Digital India
Description: Encourages digital transformation and innovation in startups.

Name: Make in India
Description: Promotes domestic manufacturing and supports industrial startups.

Name: Support for International Patent Protection (SIP-EIT)
Description: Funds MSMEs and startups for international patent filing.

Name: NewGen Innovation and Entrepreneurship Development Centre
Description: Supports tech-driven startups with mentorship and funding.

Name: Biotechnology Ignition Grant (BIG)
Description: Provides financial assistance to biotech startups.

Name: TIDE 2.0
Description: Encourages deep-tech startups in AI, IoT, and cybersecurity.

Name: ASPIRE Scheme
Description: Funds rural startups in agri-business and innovation.

Name: Startup Leadership Program
Description: Offers mentorship and networking for startup founders.

Name: Women Entrepreneurship Platform (WEP)
Description: Promotes women-led startups with resources and funding.

Name: SAMRIDH Scheme
Description: Provides early-stage funding for deep-tech startups.

Name: MSME Champions Scheme
Description: Supports micro and small businesses with funding and incubation.

Name: NIDHI PRAYAS
Description: Grants for idea-stage startups to develop prototypes.

Name: Seed Fund Scheme
Description: Provides seed capital to early-stage startups.

Name: PMEGP
Description: Prime Ministerâ€™s employment generation program for startups.

Name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act
Description: Supports rural startups with employment generation schemes.

Name: Export Promotion Capital Goods (EPCG) Scheme
Description: Provides tax benefits for startups in the export industry.

Name: Credit Linked Capital Subsidy Scheme (CLCSS)
Description: Supports MSMEs with technology upgradation.

Name: Trade Related Entrepreneurship Assistance and Development (TREAD)
Description: Provides financial aid for women entrepreneurs.

Name: Fund of Funds for Startups (FFS)
Description: Provides equity funding to startups via VC firms.

Name: Production Linked Incentive (PLI) Scheme
Description: Encourages manufacturing startups with cash incentives.

Name: Design Clinic Scheme for MSMEs
Description: Helps MSMEs adopt innovative designs for products.

Name: Incubation Support under MSME
Description: Provides incubation support for early-stage startups.

Name: Skill India Program
Description: Enhances skill development for aspiring entrepreneurs.

Name: Self-Employment and Talent Utilization (SETU)
Description: Promotes entrepreneurship and self-employment.

Name: Electronic Development Fund (EDF)
Description: Invests in early-stage startups in electronics and IT.

Name: Technology Business Incubator (TBI)
Description: Provides incubation and mentorship for tech startups.

Name: Standup India for SC/ST Entrepreneurs
Description: Supports SC/ST entrepreneurs with loans and guidance.

Name: Modified Special Incentive Package Scheme (M-SIPS)
Description: Encourages electronics manufacturing startups.

Name: Small Business Innovation Research Initiative (SBIRI)
Description: Funds biotech startups for research and commercialization.

Name: International Cooperation (IC) Scheme
Description: Supports startups in international trade fairs and expos.

Name: Startup India Investor Connect
Description: Brings startups and investors together for funding.

Name: Agri Udaan Accelerator Program
Description: Accelerator program for agritech startups.

Name: India Aspiration Fund (IAF)
Description: Funds startups through venture capital firms.

Name: Solar Energy Startup Support
Description: Grants for solar energy-based startups.

Name: Credit Enhancement Guarantee Scheme
Description: Credit support for infrastructure startups.

Name: Bank Credit Facilitation Scheme
Description: Provides easy credit access for MSMEs.
